description: Creates or deletes snapshots on a set of KVM/Libvirt hypervisors

vm_names.description: List of VM names, in KVM/Libvirt these are called domains.

snapshot_quiesce.description: Quiesce the filesystem during the snapshot, can be a PITA.

action.description: Action to perform on the snapshots. 'create' will create new snapshots on the VMs. 'delete' will delete snapshots on the VMs.
